comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: Possibly 9369 "Nive" which was in action with 14th bttn, C coy, N39, 2Lt Knox on 9th August 1918 when it reached the second objective and rallied. Photo: IWM Q6944 Source sites.google.com/site/landships/home/narratives/1918/100d... sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/mk-v-tanks/935...
